body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Wayne Brown. May I know your name, please?

This is Carolyn Roberts, and I'm quite unhappy! I heard that there was a security breach at your school.

I understand your concern, Carolyn. We are taking this matter very seriously. Could you please provide me with your student ID number so I can assist you further?

My student ID is zero zero one two three.

Thank you, Carolyn. Could you also confirm your email address on file to ensure I have the right information?

It's carolyn.roberts at email dot com.

Thank you for confirming your details. We want to assure you that we are implementing additional security measures immediately. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

No, I just want to make sure that my information is safe.

Absolutely, Carolyn. Your security is paramount to us. I appreciate your patience and understanding as we resolve this matter quickly.

Thank you for your time, Carolyn. If you have any more questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Have a great day!
